code:
var USER_LOCALSTORAGE_KEY="hrms_user";// helper to get user from localstorage
export function getStoredUser(){var storedUser=localStorage.getItem(USER_LOCALSTORAGE_KEY);return storedUser?JSON.parse(storedUser):null;}export function setStoredUser(user){localStorage.setItem(USER_LOCALSTORAGE_KEY,JSON.stringify(user));}export function clearStoredUser(){localStorage.removeItem(USER_LOCALSTORAGE_KEY);}
